text:
Mamimin,
are you okay with being in the back?

Sakuya-san...
Yeah... Because everyone... is here for me...

It's about time to get ready.
Are you prepared?

Oh... Are we really doing that?
──...I'm starting to feel nervous.

We'll be fine with the five of us──...
Let's start our story with this signal.

Actually,
Are we really going with that?

Of course!
There's no room for doubt in being idols!

We all feel the same way, Kiririn──
Alright, let's do our best!

Yeah, as long as we're all together,
we can go anywhere.

Well... At this point, there's no other
choice but to do it. ...Counting on you.
